attributes.action: Create housing for single mums with mental health at risk of losing their kids
attributes.additional_details: It doesn't exist and it is essential but needs to be governed
attributes.background: Put funding into developing the service

rejection.details:
People in the circumstances you describe should already be eligible for social housing. Decisions about provision of social housing are a matter for individual local authorities, not the Government or Parliament.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
